scripts.build-all: npm run build-aisagg && npm run build-aiscollision && npm run build-aisnocontact && npm run build-aisship && npm run build-aisusv && npm run build-aisviewer && npm run build-aistrack && npm run build-usvtrack
scripts.build-sabrs: npm run build-aisagg && npm run build-aisnocontact && npm run build-aistrack && npm run build-usvtrack
scripts.build-aisagg: cd AISAgg && docker build -t madajaju/aisagg -f Dockerfile . && docker push madajaju/aisagg
scripts.build-aiscollision: cd AISCollision && docker build -t madajaju/aiscollision -f Dockerfile . && docker push madajaju/aiscollision
scripts.build-aisnocontact: cd AISNoContact && docker build -t madajaju/aisnocontact -f Dockerfile . && docker push madajaju/aisnocontact
scripts.build-aisusv: cd AISUSV && docker build -t madajaju/aisusv -f Dockerfile . && docker push madajaju/aisusv
scripts.build-aistrack: cd AISTrackChecker && docker build -t madajaju/aistrack -f Dockerfile . && docker push madajaju/aistrack
scripts.build-usvtrack: cd USVTrackChecker && docker build -t madajaju/usvtrack -f Dockerfile . && docker push madajaju/usvtrack
scripts.build-aisvessel: cd AISVesselChecker && docker build -t madajaju/aisvessel -f Dockerfile . && docker push madajaju/aisvessel
scripts.build-aisviewer: cd AISViewer && docker build -t madajaju/aisviewer -f Dockerfile . && docker push madajaju/aisviewer
scripts.deploy-ais: npm run deploy-aisviewer && npm run deploy-aisnocontact && npm run deploy-aisagg && npm run deploy-aisship && npm run deploy-aisusv && npm run deploy-aistrack && npm run deploy-aisvessel && npm run deploy-usvtrack
scripts.deploy-sabrs: npm run deploy-aisagg && npm run deploy-aisnocontact && npm run deploy-aistrack && npm run deploy-aisvessel && npm run deploy-usvtrack
scripts.deploy-aisagg: docker service create --network sabr_network --name aisagg madajaju/aisagg
scripts.deploy-aiscollision: docker service create --network sabr_network --name aiscollision madajaju/aiscollision
scripts.deploy-aisnocontact: docker service create --network sabr_network --name aisnocontact madajaju/aisnocontact
scripts.deploy-aistrack: docker service create --network sabr_network --name aistrack madajaju/aistrack
scripts.deploy-usvtrack: docker service create --network sabr_network --name usvtrack madajaju/usvtrack
scripts.deploy-aisvessel: docker service create --network sabr_network --name aisvessel madajaju/aisvessel
scripts.deploy-pulsar: docker service create --network sabr_network -p 8080:8080 -p 6650:6650 --hostname pulsar --name pulsar madajaju/sabr_pulsar:standalone
scripts.deploy-aisusv: docker service create --network sabr_network --mode replicated-job --name aisusv madajaju/aisusv
scripts.deploy-aisviewer: docker service create --network sabr_network --name aisviewer madajaju/aisviewer
scripts.kill-ais: docker kill aisagg aiscollision aisnocontact aisship aisusv aisviewer aistrack
scripts.remove-ais: docker service rm --force aisagg aiscollision aisnocontact aisship aisusv aisviewer aistrack
scripts.destroy-ais: npm run kill-ais && npm run remove-ais
scripts.destroy-sabrs: docker service rm aisagg aisnocontact aistrack aisvessel usvtrack
